title: The 14 Best Shorts For Women - From Linen Styles to Frayed Denim Pieces
description: If you have a love/hate relationship with shorts, take comfort in the fact that you're not alone; they're a notoriously tricky wardrobe essential to pull off, but come summertime, when the temperatures warm up and you want to be wearing as little fabric as possible, they're also kind of a lifesaver. Even if you aren't totally convinced that you can pull them off, with so many different types of shorts that are available to shop online, you're bound to find at least one style that's worthy of a spot in your wardrobe. Between the mix of viral TikTok fashion trends that have been bubbling up this year and the resurgence of so many old style fads, shorts of all kinds are in for summer - from baggy mom shorts and lengthy Bermuda styles to breezy linen shorts and even a few frayed denim shorts that you can wear to the beach, brunch, and beyond. Today's hottest pieces come in all different kinds of lengths and fabrics, with silhouettes that are actually flattering and comfortable - shocking, we know. As you begin to prep your closet for the new season, we curated a guide to the best shorts for women, with styles that come from some of our favorite brands like American Eagle, Farm Rio, Reformation, Levi's, Amazon, and more. These pieces are designed to look great with everything from strappy sandals to cool everyday sneakers and, if you're feeling risqué for your next night out, even a pair of over-the-knee boots with some cheeky short shorts. Whatever your personal style is, you're sure to find your new favorite summer essential ahead.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: From breezy linen styles to lengthy Bermudas.

If you have a love/hate relationship with shorts, take comfort in the fact that you're not alone; they're a notoriously tricky wardrobe essential to pull off, but come summertime, when the temperatures warm up and you want to be wearing as little fabric as possible, they're also kind of a lifesaver. Even if you aren't totally convinced that you can pull them off, with so many different types of shorts that are available to shop online, you're bound to find at least one style that's worthy of a spot in your wardrobe.

Between the mix of viral TikTok fashion trends that have been bubbling up this year and the resurgence of so many old style fads, shorts of all kinds are in for summer — from baggy mom shorts and lengthy Bermuda styles to breezy linen shorts and even a few frayed denim shorts that you can wear to the beach, brunch, and beyond. Today's hottest pieces come in all different kinds of lengths and fabrics, with silhouettes that are actually flattering and comfortable — shocking, we know.

As you begin to prep your closet for the new season, we curated a guide to the best shorts for women, with styles that come from some of our favorite brands like American Eagle, Farm Rio, Reformation, Levi's, Amazon, and more. These pieces are designed to look great with everything from strappy sandals to cool everyday sneakers and, if you're feeling risqué for your next night out, even a pair of over-the-knee boots with some cheeky short shorts. Whatever your personal style is, you're sure to find your new favorite summer essential ahead.

01

Best Mom Shorts For Women

American Eagle Stretch Paper Bag Denim Mom Short ($30, originally $60)

This belted mom short from American Eagle feels like the most quintessential summer style thanks to its stretchy composition and body-hugging fit. As far as comfy shorts go, this pair is one of the best money can buy, as it's made from a plush cotton and elastane blend. Even if the light blue shade isn't your preference, the shorts are also available to shop in classic white.

02

Best Dad Shorts For Women

Lee High-Rise Cut Off Dad Jean Short ($33)

Dad shoes and hats have made their street style return as of late (did they ever really leave?), so it was only a matter of time before dad shorts also wiggled their way back into mainstream fashion. These Lee jeans are designed with comfort in mind, and boast a high-rise fit that flatters the waist while still giving the legs plenty of room to breathe and move around. Pair these denim shorts with comfortable walking shoes and you've got the ultimate travel outfit for your next vacation.

03

Best High-Waisted Shorts For Women

Zara Pleated Shorts ($46)

We're forever loyal to our high-waisted shorts, and this pleated style from Zara is especially chic. The white shorts are so perfect for spring and summer, as they'll add a lighter and more airy flair to any ensemble. The deep pockets make the pants all the more functional, and we'd recommend teaming them with a cool bodysuit or lightweight tank to match.

04

Best Running Shorts For Women

Lululemon Shake It Out High-Rise Running Short 2.5" ($49, originally $68)

When it comes to running shorts, there's no better brand to snag yours from than Lululemon. These high-waisted running shorts are made in four-way stretch, sweat-wicking fabric and come with a built-in liner for that snug coverage.

05

Best Biker Shorts For Women

Beyond Yoga High Waisted Biker Shorts ($68)

Few bottoms are more comfortable than a classic pair of bike shorts — and contrary to popular belief, you don't actually have to be an avid biker or athlete to sport them. These high-waisted biker shorts are our personal favorites because they're buttery soft and come equipped with a subtle lift that'll make your butt look great.

06

Best Linen Shorts For Women

Open Edit Linen Blend Bermuda Shorts ($70)

Love 'em or hate 'em, Bermuda shorts have come back in a big way in recent years. The polished silhouette is loved for its conservative design, which blends the comfort of a cropped pair of shorts with a more drawn out length that's ideal for professional occasions or any environment where you're hoping to show a little less leg.

07

Best Denim Shorts For Women

Levi's 501 Original Fit High Rise Women's Shorts ($70)

You can't go wrong with white denim for summer, and these Levi's 501 High Rise Shorts are full proof of it. The short shorts leave little to the imagination with their leggy fit, making them a great piece to reach for on any sweltering summer days.

08

Best Sweat Shorts For Women

Perfectwhitetee The Layla French Terry Sweatshort ($85)

The Layla is the best-selling sweat short from this mindfully-made LA-based brand. With a roomy leg that fans out, an elastic waistband, and draw cord, the details make for the perfect sport shorts — whether you team them with a ribbed tank or hoodie. Offered in six essential shades and a whopping 13 seasonal colors, it will be hard to settle on just one or two pairs.

09

Best Comfy Shorts For Women

PQ Bree Boho Short ($88)

Looking for something bright and vibrant? These striped shorts from PQ are bound to make a statement. Plus they're crafted from a supremely lightweight crochet material that feels soft against the skin, and also provides more breathability than a classic pair of denim or jean shorts.

10

Best Lounge Shorts For Women

Daise Quinn Gauze Shorts ($115)

If you're a fan of lounge sets, you'll never look back by teaming these lightweight and airy gauze shorts with the matching blouse. Of course, you can wear them alone. The high-waisted silhouette makes them the perfect accompaniment to a casual crop top for running errands, and you can even dress them up for a sunset occasion with a pair of wedges and a tube top.

11

Best Stylish Shorts For Women

Farm Rio Multicolor Banana Royalty Kaleidoscope Shorts ($140)

Infuse some serious color into your wardrobe with these multicolored shorts from Farm Rio. The tie-waist bottoms are supremely comfortable, but they also boast a more structured fit thanks to the style's cool belted accent which gives the pants a little more drama. Pair these with platform sandals and a cute crossbody bag for the most effortless daytime look.

12

Best Mid Rise Shorts For Women

Reformation Raye Mid Rise Relaxed Jean Shorts ($148)

If you're in the market for a pair of denim shorts that can go with virtually any item in your closet — from basic T-shirts to lightweight tanks and even elevated blouses — then these relaxed bottoms from Reformation are the perfect style for you. The casual shorts have a lengthened silhouette that's not too long or short, and their baggy fit is so comfortable, you may never want to wear jeans again.

13

Best Jean Shorts For Women

Agolde Parker Vintage Cut Off Shorts ($148)

Denim shorts are a wardrobe essential in any season, but they're particularly great for the summer — especially if you're looking for a bottom to wear while bouncing between the office, ocean, and airport (aka our dream summer agenda). You'll fall in love with these jean shorts because of their distressed hem, deep pockets, and retro-inspired light wash design.

14

Best Frayed Shorts For Women

Isabel Marant Étoile Eneidao Frayed Hem Denim Shorts ($310)

Festival-goers, these Isabel Marant Étoile Eneidao Frayed Hem Denim Shorts are just for you. The asymmetrical style gives classic jean shorts a run for their money with a leggy silhouette and seriously distressed hemline. You can channel peak-coastal cowgirl vibes by simply pairing these with some statement knee-high boots.

15

Best Dressy Shorts For Women

Sandro Hugo A-Line Shorts ($280)

Black shorts might not be considered the most traditional formal pant, but these Sandro Hugo A-line Shorts prove that they probably should be. The dressy shorts have a high-waisted design that elongates the look of legs, while the relaxed hem completes the style with a more effortless and conservative flair. Pair these with heels and a cropped blazer for the chicest office look.

16

— Additional reporting by India Yaffe and Naomi Parris

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.

Naomi Parris is the assistant shopping editor at PS, based in New York. With over eight years of experience and previous roles held on the brand's Beauty and Operations teams, she enjoys telling stories that merge fashion, beauty, and Black culture. Naomi has also lent her skillful pen to Essence Girls United, Elle, Bustle, and Elite Daily. When she's not crafting shopping roundups, high-profile features, beauty op-eds, or trend guides, you can find Naomi behind her blog "Eli-Nay," where she inspires readers through style guides, cultural pieces, and innovative content on her Instagram.
